title: Pixel 5 keyboard and scrolling sluggish - especially when charging
content:
My Pixel 5 has a very slight but noticeable delay on the keyboard, especially the outer keys e.g. P, L, Delete etc and when double tapping a letter. It's infuriating to type with.

The scrolling and flick to scroll is also very laggy.

This seems to be worse when charging.

I've changed my screen sensitivity to high but it doesn't help.
